mapper.select: SELECT id, company, job, year, `desc` descStr FROM jl_work WHERE jl_id = #{jlId} ORDER BY sort_num
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jl_work ( company, job, year, `desc`, jl_id, sort_num ) VALUES ( #{company}, #{job}, #{year}, #{descStr}, #{jlId}, #{sortNum} )
mapper.update: UPDATE jl_work SET company = #{company}, job = #{job}, year = #{year}, `desc` = #{descStr}, jl_id = #{jlId}, sort_num = #{sortNum} WHERE id = #{id}
